name: SHAPERX Women's Shapewear Bodysuit Tummy Control Body Shaper Seamless Sculpting Snatched Waist Body Suit

title: Slimming of the waist and lower belly
content: Slimming , comfortable, and light weight! Does the job for c section tummy also go a size down for optimal coverage.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I typically don't like shape wear because it feels so confining & uncomfortable, so I wasnt sure if i wouldn't like this one. I definitely had my doubts about whether I could squeeze into it when I pulled it out of the package but I was able to work it's way on with some (but not a huge amount) of effort. It fits almost perfectly. The only drawback for me is it's doing more for my tummy area than my chest. I've always had a long torso so that one piece swimsuits either dig into my shoulders or give me a wedgie so part of that is my body shape. But this shape wear is also so comfortable on. So i will probably just wear a bra with it. For reference my cup size is 40DD (or DDD), I usually wear 1X or 2X clothing, and I got the 2X/3X size for this.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2024

title: Fits great
content: I was trying to find something that would help me kind of shape and hold my stomach in I had three different special events that were coming up and I've been having a hard time getting that baby weight off after having the baby. And I came across and found this and I thought at least try it out and see. It's been working out good for me, I like it! It is definitely a bit tight, and I know that the whole idea is to help keep everything in and together. For sure it definitely does that but it's still tight. I may have to go up in a size but I don't think that they go past an extra large I got to a size extra large. I do wish they would make it in a 2X but I don't think they do, unfortunately. I've been watching it in cold water gentle cycle and then hanging it up. I've worn it five different times and it gets on it is a slight workout for me. But once I get it on I get it adjusted it was able to on three different events I was able to wear it all during that time and they were long events. I did feel a bit tired and kind of squished after the next day after one event, so maybe it's not a great idea to wear all day. I do think it's going to start stretching out slightly because it does kind of feel slightly stretched out in places now. I was really embarrassed about doing this review but I wanted to give it as honestly as I could, hoping that it would help another woman out. And I know it's going to take time to get this baby weight off but I wanted to be able to still get dressed up and look nice and not look so pooched I guess you could say, I was not blessed to be one of those beautiful curved looking women I don't seem to curve, unfortunately. But for the times I've used it it's worked out for me. I'm embarrassed to say this but I used to be a size 16 I'm in 18 and trying to put certain clothes on they don't quite want to fit and I'm have to buy new clothes that are a size 20 and being able to put the song I've been able to wear some of my older clothes before the baby. So I have nothing bad to say about it, it worked for what I needed it for. I do hope that this helps another woman out it's something that will be helpful information at when she's looking at buying it. I did also find that supported the chested area better than I was expecting which that was nice. And it did help me look more flattering and prettier than I was expecting and that was nice. So I'm Happy with my purchase! Thank you!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: GET IT!! I was skeptical about ordering this shape wear just because I've had other shape wear products and they are so uncomfortable and they are not cheap I was between this one and the Yahaira shape wear but I ended up choosing this one because it was a lot cheaper and I seen a tick tock review saying that it's actually a dupe comparing to the Yahaira shape wear I am so glad I ended up getting this shape wear it was so comfortable it was not rolling on me it's the first time I've ever been happy with a shapewear that I purchased I ended up getting a large / extra-large and I weigh about 188 and I'm 5'2 I didn't feel like I couldn't breathe or I couldn't move around I was able to dance in this & I was able to sit in this for a few hours I love it. It looks natural... I HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2024

title: It's been working out good, I like it!
content: I love it. It doesn't show my nippers. Its long enough in my torso. I bought to help with my back pain. I carry most of my weight in my front mid section. It's strong but elastic. The material isn't hot to wear. No holes. The ONLY thing I would change would make the straps wider because us ladies with big boots have issues with straps cutting into our shoulders. This is the only reason I'm wearing a sports bra underneath. If they were to male one with wide shoulders straps I'd be comfortable because it hold up my boots pretty good. I'm 5'3.5" 210 lbs and the 2x/3x fit good.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I‚Äôve gained about 80 pounds in the last year, so I‚Äôm now 5‚Äô9 and 230 pounds. Size 14/16/18 depending on brands (XL-XXL). I‚Äôve been on the hunt to eliminate my muffin top. No matter what pants I wear I always have a bit of a muffin top and back rolls. I am a 34J bra (36 sometimes) cause I have a small rib cage but lots of fat in that area which causes digging and it‚Äôs just not good lol. This bodysuit makes me feel so sexy. As you can see there‚Äôs no muffin top, and I can even wear it under yoga pants without too much showing! That‚Äôs my main issue with most bodysuits is the digging on my hips and butt, I have large hip dips but also a big butt and it makes for weird fits. I even sized down 1-2 sizes for the snatch and it still stretches to fit me! Obviously my boobs are kinda out but that‚Äôs what happens when you wear a j cup lol. I will say, DO NOT ORDER THE THONG IF YOU HAVE A BIGGER PUNANI/FUPA/ETC. it digs in so much. Order the brief instead. I returned the thong thinking it would work in that size but I ordered the brief and I‚Äôm so glad I did. Overall, I‚Äôve never made a review on here but I feel so confident that I had to share as a plus size girly. Also 4 stars is only because the panty area could be bigger/more inclusive, as well as the chest area.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I absolutely LOVE this shapewear!! I wore it to a concert with a cargo skirt and the comfort level was INSANE. Overall, it was still a great choice for a fun night out and really snatched me up! Worth buying.
